subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The former Tour de France winner Jan Ullrich won more than $433,000 in back pay after denying under oath taking drugs in the early part of 2003 before a German court in Düsseldorf. Ullrich, who won the Tour in 1997, has long been suspected of doping but has vehemently denied doing so.
